### TABLEDATA

CREATE TABLE CustomerQueries(id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  query_text TEXT,
  response_text TEXT,
  is_resolved BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE)

CREATE TABLE QueryTriggers(id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  trigger_name VARCHAR(255),
  trigger_sql TEXT)

CREATE TABLE TriggerLogs(id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  trigger_id INT,
  log_message TEXT,
  log_timestamp TIMESTAMP)

CREATE TABLE ResponseHistory(id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  query_id INT,
  response_id INT,
  response_timestamp TIMESTAMP)

### STATEMENT

UPDATE CustomerQueries SET is_resolved = TRUE WHERE id = 1;
